subject: Simsonn sq pro
description_text:
Hi when will it be back. In stock, I'd like to purchase this and the hb pro
at the same time.


Thanks,
Lee

conversations.body_text: Hi Lee Martin,    We've gone through over a dozen design prototypes and still haven't found the perfect fit. We're currently still testing prototypes, so we can't confirm if this will be the final iteration.
